hooks.command: cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR" && DIRTY=$(git diff --name-only HEAD 2>/dev/null) && UNPUSHED=$(git log @{u}..HEAD --oneline 2>/dev/null) && if [ -n "$DIRTY" ] || [ -n "$UNPUSHED" ]; then echo '{"decision":"block","reason":"STOP BLOCKED: You have uncommitted or unpushed changes. Per CLAUDE.md you MUST git add, commit, and push ALL changes before stopping."}'; else echo '{}'; fi
